title: British Journal of Dermatology
aka: British Journal of Dermatology and Syphilis
additional-notes: This is a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
This journal was published as the British Journal of Dermatology and Syphilis from 1917 to 1950.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
